title: Design and Operation of Situational Judgment Tests for Pre-Service Teachers' Competency Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Assessment of problem-solving skills based on real educational situations in language subjects

learning_goals: Teachers can analyze conflicts arising during student-centered lesson design through situational judgment tests and propose solutions.
Teachers can establish response strategies using emotional intelligence and problem-solving competencies for issues encountered in language arts instruction.
Teachers can interpret results from NLP-based automated evaluation systems for descriptive situational judgment tests and apply them to self-reflection.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
